info.name: Clean Discord!
info.description:
https://discord.gg/6fBjvuG

Clean Discord is currently the #1 working discord theme on userstyles.org. It was created to provide you with the upmost discord experience. Some of the many features are: 1. Customizable background for both discord itself, and the profile pop-up window. 2. Channel and Member list slide/fade in and out animation when hovered over. 3. A cleaner masterfully hand-picked color palette. 4. Transparency on multiple elements.
info.additionalInfo:
-----------------------------------------------9/13/19 4:00 AM - [V.1.0.0]-----------------------------------------------
    - Initial Release.

-----------------------------------------------9/13/19 4:00 PM - [V.1.0.1]-----------------------------------------------
    - Smoother transitions.

-----------------------------------------------9/13/19 6:00 PM - [V.1.0.2]-----------------------------------------------
    - Added fade in and out toolbar.
    - Better looking voice call box.

-----------------------------------------------9/14/19 3:30 AM - [V.1.0.3]----------------------------------------------- 
    - Better Graphics.
    - Major Bug fixes to some colors and Items.
    - Fixed user tab separate fade.
    - Converted almost all solids to somewhat transparent.
    - Changed opacity settings for desktop-background, and more.

-----------------------------------------------9/14/19 4:30 PM - [V.1.0.4]-----------------------------------------------            
    - Fixed server scrolling.
    - Fixed opacity on "Playing Game" section in the profile popup.

-----------------------------------------------9/15/19 6:18 AM - [V.1.0.5]-----------------------------------------------    
    - New animated global background.
    - New animated profile popup background.
    - Some font recoloring.
    - Opacity changes.
    - Hover boundary for channel and people tabs increased to 40px from 20px.
    - Fixed opacity on the "Spotify" section of the profile popup.
Notes:
    - the actual challenging thing about this update was choosing a profile popup background
and global background that match and look good.

-----------------------------------------------9/15/19 7:00 AM - [V.1.0.6]-----------------------------------------------
    - Minor Opacity Changes.
-----------------------------------------------9/16/19 2:00 AM - [V.1.0.7]-----------------------------------------------
    - Background now static due to lag spikes from animated background 
(if you have a good computer you can try using gifs)
    - Opacity changes
    - Profile popup background now sexy still high quality image
-----------------------------------------------9/21/19 12:00 PM - [V.1.0.8]--------------------------------------------
    - Minor bug fixes to profile popup after discord update
-----------------------------------------------9/26/19 5:00 PM - [V.1.0.9]---------------------------------------------- 
    - Opacity adjustments
    - Search popup color fix
    - Cleaner look
-----------------------------------------------9/26/19 7:00 PM - [V.1.1.0]---------------------------------------------- 
    - Removed toolbar transition
    - Color fixes
-----------------------------------------------9/26/19 7:30 PM - [V.1.1.1]---------------------------------------------- 
    - Adding background selection in update settings
    - ``` [text] ``` aka (code block) color fixes
-----------------------------------------------9/27/19 12:00 AM - [V.1.1.2]---------------------------------------------- 
    - New customization options 
    - Visual bug fixes
-----------------------------------------------10/1/19 3:40 PM - [V.1.1.3]-----------------------------------------------
    - New link and file input options for the custom background section ("Customize Settings" Tab)
-----------------------------------------------10/2/19 2:00 PM - [V.1.1.4]-----------------------------------------------
    - Enabling light mode no longer breaks everything
-----------------------------------------------10/2/19 2:40 PM - [V.1.1.5]-----------------------------------------------
    - Fixed light mode user tab
-----------------------------------------------10/10/19 11:40 PM - [V.2.0.0]--------------------------------------------
    - Complete re-haul and monstrous update of the code to optimize performance and look
    - New default wallpaper
    - Transparency re-haul
    - Color re-haul
    - Code re-haul
    - New profile popup theme
|***|Thank you all for the support so far, I do not plan on abandoning this project anytime soon|***|
-----------------------------------------------10/11/19 12:40 AM - [V.2.0.1]--------------------------------------------
    - One new still wallpaper
    - One new animated wallpaper
-----------------------------------------------10/11/19 9:00 PM - [V.2.0.1]--------------------------------------------
    - Complete profile popup redesign
    - One (Still) wallpaper removal
-----------------------------------------------10/13/19 1:00 AM - [V.2.0.2]--------------------------------------------
    - Code Optimization 
    - Activity tab fixed (complete makeover)
    - Profile pop-up updated to look MUCH more clean and tidy
    - Tons of fixes for light-mode users (smh)
    - Members tab slide animation updated to work on new discord update
-----------------------------------------------10/13/19 2:30 AM - [V.2.0.3]--------------------------------------------
    - Profile popup removed gradient and adjusted the transparencies
    - Added one new still background
-----------------------------------------------10/13/19 2:30 AM - [V.2.0.3]--------------------------------------------
    - Profile popup removed gradient and adjusted the transparencies
    - Added one new still background
-----------------------------------------------10/14/19 2:00 AM - [V.2.0.4]--------------------------------------------
    - Profile popup rework, cleaner look
    - Added menu (right click) background image
    -modded ban/kick buttons
